珠圓玉潤.definition: lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom); fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)

珠山.definition: Mount Everest (abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰[Zhu1 mu4 lang3 ma3 Feng1]); Zhushan, district of Jingdezhen City 景德鎮市|景德镇市[Jing3 de2 zhen4 Shi4], Jiangxi

珠山區.definition: Zhushan district of Jingdezhen City 景德鎮市|景德镇市[Jing3 de2 zhen4 Shi4], Jiangxi

珠峰.definition: Mount Everest (abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰[Zhu1mu4lang3ma3 Feng1])

珠崖.definition: Zhuya, historic name for Hainan Island 海南島|海南岛[Hai3 nan2 Dao3]

珠暉.definition: Zhuhui district of Hengyang city 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2 yang2 shi4], Hunan

珠暉區.definition: Zhuhui district of Hengyang city 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2 yang2 shi4], Hunan

珠流.definition: fluent with words; words flowing like pearl beads

珠流璧轉.definition: lit. pearl flows, jade moves on (idiom); fig. the passage of time; water under the bridge

珠海市.definition: Zhuhai, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]

珠澳.definition: Zhuhai and Macau (abbr. for 珠海[Zhu1 hai3] + 澳門|澳门[Ao4 men2])

珠玉.definition: pearls and jades; jewels; clever remark; beautiful writing; gems of wisdom; genius; outstanding person

珠玉在側.definition: gems at the side (idiom); flanked by genius

珠璣.definition: (literary) pearl; gem; (literary) (fig.) eloquent phrase; pearl of wisdom

珠穆朗瑪.definition: Mount Everest (from its Tibetan name, Chomolungma)

珠穆朗瑪峰.definition: Mount Everest (from its Tibetan name, Chomolungma)

珠箔.definition: curtain of pearls; screen of beads

珠聯璧合.definition: string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination; perfect pair

珠胎暗結.definition: to get pregnant out of wedlock

珠茶.definition: gunpowder tea, Chinese green tea whose leaves are each formed into a small pellet

珠頸斑鳩.definition: (bird species of China) spotted dove (Spilopelia chinensis)
